meanings.definition: To spur a horse with a rowel.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy was rowelling his horse to make it go faster.
meanings.sent2: She rowelled the horse gently to guide it in the right direction.
meanings.sent3: The horse seemed to enjoy the rowelling, thinking it was a playful nudge.
meanings.sent4: Her words rowelled him into action, like a sharp prod to his motivation.
meanings.sent5: The rowelling motion of the rider's boot was rhythmic and precise.
